title: Mike Spinelli (The/DRIVE, Jalopnik OG)
description:
Mike Spinelli has had some of the best jobs in automotive  journalism: a founder of Jalopnik, former editor of 0-60 Magazine, talking head on /DRIVE on NBCSports, and host of several shows on YouTube's /DRIVE Network. He knows -and has seen- a lot.

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/0bvzBXLXluc

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @mikespin

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @mikespin

 

Check out our merch!

https://www.blipshift.com/collections/the-smoking-tire
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
